name: Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Blueprint cutaway: Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop, top/side/cross-section/decks, ballast, pressure hulls, engines, crew, clean blueprint, fantasy nautical/aeronautical vernacular with realm materials, cosmic surrealism, impossible geometries, starfield grain, indigo glows, sturdy functional blueprint vernacular, palette: indigos, violets, black, cold silver, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Use numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03…) instead of long text annotations. Include a clean legend area without rendering complex paragraphs., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Blueprint cutaway of Hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop.
callouts: numbered pins 01..10; legend area reserved; no paragraph labels
revised_prompt: A fantastical, cosmic and surreal tabletop scene in the flavor of Dungeons & Dragons 5e. The central piece is a hybrid Rift-Runner Sloop imagined in a painterly, medieval fantasy style. The image should comprise top, side, and cross-section views of the sloop, revealing different decks, ballast, pressure hulls, and engines. The ship is equipped with gear that's culturally coherent and crafted from realm's materials, devoid of modern technology. An ethereal layer of cosmic surrealism envelops the scene with impossible geometries, a starfield grain, and soft indigo glows. The clean blueprint design is sturdy and functional, favors vernacular of fantasy nautical and aeronautical concepts. The dominate colors are indigo, violet, black, and cold silver. Implement numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03…) for details and provide a clean legend area for references. The image should be devoid of artifacts, sci-fi UIs, modern signs, and bloom glare with an emphasis on a paint-like aesthetic as opposed to photoreal CGI or anime.
